text: Oru New Generation Pani is a Malayalam movie Written and directed by Shankar Narayanan. and featured Biyon,Anil Kumar MS,Devan and Thalaivasal Vijay in Lead Roles. ==Cast== * Biyon * Deepthi * Devan * Anil Murali * Thalaivasal Vijay * Saju Kodiyan * Narayanankutty * jaffer idukki * Manju Raghavan ==References== Category:2010s Malayalam-language films Category:Indian films
title: Oru New Generation Pani
